DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Chemoprevention use certain drug keep cancer forming , grow , come back . The use fish oil and/or green tea may prevent prostate cancer . PURPOSE : This randomized clinical trial study well fish oil and/or green tea supplement work prevent prostate cancer patient prostatic intraepithelial neoplasia risk develop prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Fish Oil Green Tea Extract Preventing Prostate Cancer Patients Who Are Risk Developing Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine cancer prevent effect fish oil supplementation green tea extract use marker alteration lipid metabolism prostate tissue sample . OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study . Patients stratify accord age ( 65 vs 65 ) . Patients randomize 1 4 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive oral fish oil three time daily oral green tea extract twice daily . - Arm II : Patients receive oil placebo three time daily oral green tea extract twice daily . - Arm III : Patients receive oral fish oil three time daily placebo twice daily . - Arm IV : Patients receive oil placebo three time daily another placebo twice daily . Treatment one above-listed arm continue 20 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . All patient undergo prostate biopsy last day study treatment . After completion study treatment , patient receive follow-up phone call at/around 30 day later . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 144 patient accrue study .
